entry.data:
RAIN SHOWERS AND SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH ISOLATED THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN SHOWERS
SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN SNOW LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SNOW, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS AROUND ZERO
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
